content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5) 
- Boiler (position -25.5, 20.0) 
- Offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5) 
- Small electric poles (multiple positions: -16.5, 18.5; -16.5, 19.5; -16.5, 20.5; -19.5, 22.5; -16.5, 21.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position -17.5, 23.5)

### Assembling machine factory at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting boiler to pipe groups
- Ensure that the boiler is within range of a working pipe group before attempting to connect. Check the positions of both the boiler and the pipe group to confirm connectivity.

### Errors with boiler and steam engine not operational
- Verify that the boiler has a water source and is connected to a working pipe group. Ensure that the steam engine is connected to the boiler and has access to steam.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities that may block placement.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
